product_name: Primal Wear Velia Bike Tank Top - Women's
long_description: Stay cool and look good on and off the bike in the women's Primal Wear Velia Bike Tank Top with built-in support bra and sun protection. Q3 Elite polyester fabric features a square-grid texture that adds aesthetic appeal and lightens the weight; plus, it wicks moisture away from the skin and dries quickly. Double-knit construction provides 4-way stretch to free up your movements. Offers UPF 35 sun protection. 2 rear pockets. Primal Wear Velia Bike Tank Top for women features an internal support bra so you can just pull it on and go.
short_description: Stay cool and look good on and off the bike in the women's Primal Wear Velia Bike Tank Top with built-in support bra and sun protection.
